comment.author: 69662531@N05
comment._content:
Uk Soldiers Died in the Great War has this:

Name:George William Scott
Birth Place:Hornsey, Middlesex
Residence:Holloway, Middlesex
Death Date:16 Sep 1916
Death Location:France & Flanders
Enlistment Location:Highgate, Middlesex
Rank:Sergeant
Regiment:Duke of Cambridge's Own (Middlesex Regiment)
Battalion:1/7th Battalion
Number:T.F.200020
Type of Casualty:Killed in action

comment.author: 93116070@N02
comment._content:
I've just found that my Great Uncle, Sidney Mackenzie Stevens, also in the 1/7 Btn, Middlesex Regiment, was wounded and reported missing at Leuze wood on 15th September 1916. He was presumed dead on 17/8/17 and then, rather mysteriously re-buried at Combles Cemetery in '22. Would anyone have any information about him? - I would love to have a photo!

Andrew Stevens
